ENV_SetClass

C Specification

#include <nitro/env.h>
void ENV_SetClass( const char* className );

Arguments

className The class name.

Return Values

None.

Description

Specifies the class name to be supplemented when the class name is omitted in the function argument that requires a resource name.

For example:

ENV_SetClass( "MYCLASS" );
n = ENV_GetU32( ".U32VALUE" );

is equivalent to

n = ENV_GetU32( "MYCLASS.U32VALUE" );

 

See Also

ENV_Init, ENV_Get*, ENV_GetType, ENV_GetSize

Revision History
